website_summaries.verdict: If you need a serious cart for everything you take to the beach, this one has features and construction that put it at the top of our list.
pros: Folds easily and compactly for carrying/storage
cons: Though it can accommodate lots of items, it may tip when full
Drags a bit in soft sand

customer_reviews.title: Update design you can do at home!! Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Updated design!! Cut yourself a piece of 5/16” threaded rod and switch out the existing 11” axel to a 20” axel. This will allow the wheels to sit at the corners instead of the middle. It really improves the stability. Only drawback is that it won’t fold down 100% but I think it’s well worth it, especially if you have children. Tips over in any condition other than flat ground. Injured my son when it fell over and hit him while he was napping. Your engineers should be fired. There is a reason cars have 4 wheels and not 3.
customer_reviews.author: Scheel

customer_reviews.title: Tip over nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: The tip overs are driving me nuts. This thing looks so darn cool. I want to love it, but I can’t. If the ground isn’t perfectly level, it’s going to tip. I can’t believe they haven’t gone back to the drawing board with this design. I am so, so disappointed. I can’t take it to baseball practice, soccer practice, or the beach. All three of those places have uneven surfaces. My only use for it is back and forth between houses in the neighborhood. So, so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for the beach after reading all sorts of different reviews about it not being great for sand, but it worked out wonderfully for us. The side table is a huge plus, I didn't realize how much I was missing it till I had a nice cup holder all day, and a place to set snacks! It fit all of our beach chairs, towels, wet suits, and a small cooler. I wouldn't recommend over packing it, but the wheels are large enough to handle a decent load. Compared to our friends beach cart with smaller wheels, this one got through the sand much better! Super easy to set up, store, and load in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cart for the beach, backyard or the leak
customer_reviews.text: This cart is absolutely amazing, it’s very sturdy, will hold 3 to 4 adult chairs for the beach, plus toys for the kids and a cooler For food and drinks. You don’t need any bungees straps it’s easily deep enough to hold All your summer apparel for the beach. As you can see in the pictures the cart can hold three beach chairs and a cooler a bag of toys a bag of towels and suntan lotion and a stereo for the beach within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: robert76

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the beach and it is awesome. If that's what you're looking to do with it as well I suggest purchasing some bungee cords too. We load this cart up with coolers and chairs and it does the job through soft sand or whatever you may encounter.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Shooshan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy. It helped me know many events that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and sturdy. It helped me know many events that I had to carry boxes of wooden boards and water bottles. There are 2 things bother me, 1. Width is little narrow to carry some big boxes and water bottle bundle. 2. There is no break. It will roll on hill when you park. And there is no way to make it stand when you fold it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jung

customer_reviews.title: Missing wheel locking Design
customer_reviews.text: “Greatly Dislike” that it has no Locking ability for the Wheels to keep it in place during Collapsing and/or storing the Wagon in place once Closed. Making the handing very sloppy and difficult to handle (Item is Heavy) once closed or during closing. Forcing You to store in Flat position taking too much space...will NOT stay upright, even leaning against something. Should have some type of wheel locking mechanism for Wheel or wheels. Otherwise, very useful and strong construction.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Velez

customer_reviews.title: I love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is awesome! If you are the beach mule for your family this thing will change your life! All the other beach mule dads will have wagon envy as the slog through the sand with their inferior wheels. I’m serious! I get people checking out my wagon because it goes so well in the sand. This thing folds up like a charm and serves as a table for drinks, phones, etc. I can get a yeti 20, 6 towels, two beach bags, six beach chairs, and a tent on her and make it a quarter mile through the soft sand no problem! It’s not cheap but it’s well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Three wheels not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The three wheeled wagon is really not sturdy at all. It tipped constantly over uneven terrain (especially on the beach) we eventually had to return it - company refunded our purchase, we bought the 4 wheel version that works well
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: This wagon will tip over
customer_reviews.text: My kids got hurt in it due to the tipping over in the front. We will return it, because of safety concerns. DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO CARRY KIDS INSIDE!
customer_reviews.author: MaryGym

customer_reviews.title: Rollin', rollin', rollin'
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon. My not-quite two year ole grandson could even pull it! Liked the quality and the way it is built to help prevent tip overs.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and her family. She loved it. She will be using it to carry all her necessities at the various sports events her children are in. She was pleased at how easily it folded up and how compact it was. She also liked the tray that could carry beverages. The wide tires will work great on uneven, rocky or sandy terrain. Set up was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sooch

customer_reviews.title: wrong size  and way too big wheel
customer_reviews.text: just got this today from amazon warehouse, like new condition , was planning to put my fridge ( Dometic CFX 50W) into this wagon and move around. but unfortunatly the interior size is wrong, it say 21inch wide but way less than that, my fridge is about 17.7inch wide, still barely fit. and the wheel would be nice on beach, but when this thing show up in front of me , i am still suprised by how big it actually is. . but this is my fault , my main concern is the size. planning to return it . maybe the previous buyer returned it for same reason :)
customer_reviews.author: jerrylin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in soft sand
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work in softer sand and tips over regardless if you put the weight in the front or back.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for any serious beach goer
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more satisfied! Great engineering and the wide tires are indispensable. We use to throw our chairs and umbrella over our backs and drag, skid rather, our wheeled cooler down the beach. Now a quick load of the cart and we're mostly hands free. The table is a great bonus, back it in between our chairs - very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your beach needs & used for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Live saver! Perfect for all your beach needs & used for a fishing day as well - held everything wonderfully - the table is well worth having! Folds very easily & loved the big tires. We used on a pier for fishing & on harder packed sand on the beach & worked very well. Not put off by plastic wheels on road as I would expect not to be quite but was not overly loud. Stores nicely! My daughter loved it so much she is getting one too!
customer_reviews.author: tamera jansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cart. I’ve used it multiple times now to cart my items into/out of vendor shows. The wheels are plastic and although I’m worried about their longevity, they have held up so far. I’d use this for the beach as well just to see how it would go through the sand. The only issue I have is that the handle will just drop unless it is stuck securely in the little slot (hard to explain). To put the handle in the slot to secure, the handle MUST be in the low position. Sometimes that is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Served it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a beach vacations to haul our stuff from the condo to the beach. Does pull a little hard in the sand but its still better than making 5 trips. The front wheels will raise off the ground if the load is not balanced correctly. Rolls great on pavement and hard packed ground. Very easily to fold but will not stand up against a wall because it wants to roll away. We just threw a flip flop under the wheel. We will definitely use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for beach trips!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best! A must have for beach trips! My husband actually made the statement over and over during our vacay - “Where has this thing been all my life?!?” It made a world of difference, helping to make the many trips from condo to beach so much easier. We were able to carry 2 chairs, many beach toys, cooler, 2 boogie boards and 4 towels...and more. It moved so easily through the sand. It came assembled. It folds with ease. I highly recommend this wagon!!
customer_reviews.author: GaCakeMom

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping handle doesn't lock into place
customer_reviews.text: Initially, a great wagon; holds a lot and the wheels really get over everything. I've loved the tray at the back to hold my water bottle and it doesn't fall out when going over bumpy ground. Two cons (and why I'm giving it the two start rating) the telescoping handle doesn't lock into place. When I pull it, it ends up extending to it's full length, and most annoying of all, and rendering the wagon pretty pointless, is when I need to back the wagon up, the handle telescopes back down to it's shortest length making me bend over so far that I end up pushing it from it's frame and not using the handle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 10 trips to the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my beach house, it’s a 4 min walk to beach. A few folding chars and a cooler is what I use it for. Worked Ok until the handle and front wheels Snapped off pulling it down the street. Very poor cold weld, I’m surprised it lasted as long as it did, reading reviews this seems like a common problem. You pay to ship back to them, then they will decide if they will warrantee it, no thanks I’ll just cut my losses.
customer_reviews.author: roymac

customer_reviews.title: Tips over way too easy
customer_reviews.text: It's a tip over nightmare. The design is horrible with the front wheelsnso close together. It might work fine on pavement but for sand or anything else just forget this thing. I wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great in the mud as well as sand!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to bring to the MXON race in Michigan this year. They had rain for weeks prior and the mud was 3 feet deep in some spots. This wagon pulled thru with ease. The back wheels have a metal skid on the top that would scrape the mud off the tire and keep it moving, once in a while a rock would jam up and have to be removed, but overall this made the hike thru the mud easy. We put our grandson in it with a blanket and he rode in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!! A must have for having little one(s) and going to the beach easy to use, however, can easily tip if weight isn’t easily distributed and with the front wheels being close together causes it to be an issue at times. But if I had to choose again between this and another it would be this one because it made it going through the sand with ease.
customer_reviews.author: MBrew

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live this wagon any more! So easy to use, open and fold, my kids love to sit in it, makes trips to the beach a breeze, hold so much and the tray is a great addition. Doesn’t sink in the sand, a little tough on soft sand but still pulls well! The ONLY thing I can say I wish it had was a lock for the wheels when collapsed. Otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: A huge help with kids and the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our beach vacation! Loaded our 1.5 year old twins in the back, other, lighter supplies in the front. Can tip going up hills or on slopes so go slow and don't be a knucklehead. Strapped floaties to the back, too. Great to have, will get a lot of use off the beach, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I had spent HOURS doing research on a 'beach' wagon. This is what I decided to purchase, knowing it would not be the best for what I wanted, but the best for what I was willing to spend. Those squishy/bubble wheels seem to be the only thing that goes through soft sand, but the price is insane! This wagon goes great on hard surfaces, and ok in the soft sand. It is SO easy to fold and unfold. Super sturdy, and can hold a lot. The cup holders are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Wagon! I Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! Great on the Beach and Sand. I'd totally recommend for beach lovers. I carried so much in it and wasn't even heavy on sand.👌 I recommend this for beach lovers ⛱ 🦀 🏝🌊
customer_reviews.author: Potato

customer_reviews.title: When I pack I like to take just about everything except the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Brought the cart for my beach vacation. When I pack I like to take just about everything except the kitchen sink! The large wheels performed great on the sand. The handle length was great for pulling I am 5'7. The cup holder was also a great addition that held cans and bottle drinks. We also used the cart for fishing on the pier. Once again it held all of our fishing rods, tackle boxes, cooler etc.. folded up easily and came with a cover. I cant say enough about how happy I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly walker

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! Haven’t taken it out to the beach/sand yet ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Haven’t taken it out to the beach/sand yet but with the large wheels I don’t foresee a problem. Placed my 3 year old in there and had plenty of space for cooler and other beach accessories. Well built and sturdy. Super easy to maneuver and I love the little table with drink holders. Very happy with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: DVB22

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is awesome. We use it in our RV for transporting items to locations. For example we went to Arkansas’ diamond mine to dig for diamonds. We put our tools, buckets, cooler, chairs in it. The terrain was very rough and dusty, it was so much better than carrying everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia A Morris

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: We are a baseball family and have had our good share of collapsible carriages but this one is the real deal! Sturdy, tough on all terrain. It did come a bit damaged in the shipment but we are willing to overlook as it certainly performs in all our sporting outings.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have... easy to use... very useful and practical. I call it, my own "Rover". I feel like I'm walking in Mars when I'm coming back with the groceries/supplies.
customer_reviews.author: niXXiL

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a huge hit for my husband's father's day present. He was so happy with it he took it out of the box and wheeled it right down to his assistant coach's house to show it off! As a baseball head coach it got used very hard and stood the test! I haven't seen any other wagon like it on the field with it's big wheels and drink tray. It is so sturdy and folds so small, it was worth the extra couple of dollars to get the better version.
customer_reviews.author: amom

customer_reviews.title: Tearing at the Seams/Fold Points
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but for the fact that within 3 months the wagon began tearing at the seams/fold points, eventually forming holes. Have only used this to take my 2 year old on short walks around the neighborhood and did not expect it would break down so quickly. Do you have repair kits available?
customer_reviews.author: Blake Olson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This wide wheel wagon was perfect for the beach. It carried a large load and still had room for more. This is the second wagon we’ve purchased and it has never disappointed us! We donated the first wagon to our kids and it still works great for them! Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bidinger

customer_reviews.title: Unstable!
customer_reviews.text: If your planning on using this thing on ANY thing other than perfectly flat ground DONT BUY IT! I took it to a festival in the mountains thinking these awesome "all terrain tires" would be great and boy was I WRONG! It's supposed to be heavy duty but the second I rolled it 6ft it tipped over spilling everything out....this happened over 10 times on my trips back and forth from my camp spot to my van....it was a serious pain! The fact that the front tires are positioned together makes it a tri-cart so it's extremely unstable. The tires held up great but what good is that when it tips over every few min?!
customer_reviews.author: angelicflamesva

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cart!
customer_reviews.text: It just works. Nothing other than big pneumatic tires will work perfectly on soft sand and this cart do not have that but with that said, it handles pretty well. On any other surface is perfect and takes a pretty good load without any problems!
customer_reviews.author: D'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: I love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Great wagon! It hold so much. I fit two beach chairs, beach tent, cooler, food/snacks, 2 beach bags and a small back pack. It was so easy to pull through the sand. It is easy to set up. Nice pockets to put keys or what ever you need.The table is a great addition too. The only thing is once, folded it doesn't stand up. You would have to lay it on its side. But will still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good for stuff, maybe not kids.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, 2, would not sit in it because he could feel the frame underneath him. He's used to Little Tykes hard plastic so it felt unsteady for him. I just purchased a seat cushion and will try him in it again. The other item I'm not crazy about is that there is no brake, so going downhill it was not easy to maneuver. Otherwise it's light, easily collapsible, durable and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tamulionis

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wagon
customer_reviews.text: It seems big out of the box but it’s awesome. Perfect for the sand/beach, movies in the park, camping, all kinds of stuff. And it’s strong/well built. I see some of these others and think they’re gonna crumble. Folds up nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Piskulic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy great on sand. It was $100 more than a flimsy one at Costco, but so worth it. #1 the wheels are huge for the beach, this one steers, has a table and is larger and so much beefier. Winner all around and so worth the extra $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Hilary W.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality, poor wheel base design
customer_reviews.text: Why did they not design so the front wheels can be extended out to match the back? The front wheel design makes the cart easy to topple over. If going straight up or straight down, its fine. Any turn or small incline, will cause it to turn over. Overall good quality minus the front wheel base.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS B KREME

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one for a while as I get stuck carrying most of the heavy items down to the beach front. Finally decided this was the ticket. The fold up / down drink stand comes in very handy for extra drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Logistics Guy

customer_reviews.title: Storable wagon for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We live on the Balboa Peninsula Point with the beach a block away. We previously had a big wagon with fat rubber tires for transporting beach items across the sand. This one also has wide tireS for the sand but, since it is collapsible it Hangs in the garage out of the way. Like the folding tray table.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, because I have bought several different beach carts over the years and they had one issue or another. Not this one. It fits everything I need to take for a full day at the beach and goes through sand with great ease. The little table with the drink holders is just icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Porter

customer_reviews.title: Well made cart that pulls easily on solid ground.
customer_reviews.text: The cart is nice and on firm ground pull easily. I was at an event with lots of mud and the wheels became caked with mud and stopped turning because the wheels have little clearance. Mud is one place the narrow wheeled carts have an advantage. I may have to fabricate something to scrape mud off the wheels. I do like how the handle controls the direction of the front wheels, other styles with independently rotating front wheels wander when you pull a wagon on smooth ground.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: mack daddy
customer_reviews.text: may be a little bit expensive. Might be a little bulky. But you make everyone else on the beach wish they had bought this instead of the piece of crap that they bought!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Normac70

customer_reviews.title: Fine on smooth surface.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but doesn’t roll well on the beach sand when loaded with a cooler and beach stuff. Tends to tip backwards when pulling gets tough.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not good in sand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wagon for the beach, thinking the large wheels would roll well in the sand. It did not roll well in the sand. It was more like dragging the wagon up and down the sandy beach. It rolled very well on the sidewalk and street.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon option for beach
customer_reviews.text: Great wagon. Worked on beach. Need a little for soft sand but noticed everyone with a wagon pulling harder on the soft sand. It is durable. Easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: LoveOne

customer_reviews.title: Super Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an anniversary gift for son and daughter in law because they camp all the time and he has a fishing boat. They love it and say they use it almost everyday. He says it’s great to bring in groceries in one trip. The possible uses are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed to find the carry bin to be somewhat shallow compared to the previous wagon I owned (different brand). The one problem I have is when I try to take the cover off or put it on the unit becomes unstable and I have to push the wheels up against a wall or my car. I use the wagon to move my athletic equipment to and from my class venues. I love the huge wheels. It makes pulling lots of weight easy. Overall the wagon works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome...great wagon. I just wish it would be able to lean against a wall for storage without rolling and falling down. Maybe a wheel lock?
customer_reviews.author: Montecore

customer_reviews.title: Large and cumbersome not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a disabled military veteran and is receiving treatment at the local VA hospital. I bought this cart to help haul luggage and other belongings to and from hotel rooms. I thought this could also come in handy for hauling groceries from the car (Costco runs or market). It wasn’t what I was expecting the wheels are huge and hard plastic. It is large and cumbersome. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad wheel design but is functional.
customer_reviews.text: Works only if you are pulling in a straight line. The wagon tipped on me multiple times due to the front wheels being placed in the middle. The tipping occurred mainly when one side was slightly heavier than the other and was worse when in the sand. It tipped in the sand and even on pavement. I get the design has to be this way to fold nicely but beware of turning without holding one side.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I spent a little more then I wanted to on this, but it was totally worth it. Not having to lug a ton of crap to and from the beach while we wrangle our kids was amazing and made each day start easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: Topples over frequently
customer_reviews.text: Get one with 4 wheels - this tripod design tips over way too easy! Straight line towing perfectly fine, start turning and plan on picking up your stuff repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rooke

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty off-roader.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty off-roader. My kids love it. It's better any other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koskinen

customer_reviews.title: For the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is used to haul the baseball gear for one grandson and to haul the other grandkids around on walks. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy trask

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: Only really complaint is when folded it does not stand up itself. Other models will stay standing when folded up. Sturdy and easy to pull through rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Does not move well in soft sand
customer_reviews.text: This item works well on the road and hard sand but the whole purpose was to carry our beach chairs and bags in the soft sand and the wagon is horrible to use! I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Lelievre

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: This folds easily. It hauls lots of stuff. Most of all it steers as you desire, rather than the ones that may or may not follow you...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Froman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. I used it for soccer games. It was so helpful lugging all the equipment around. It was a big relief. Best investment I made. We will use at the beach this summer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spahr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use, and great for most terrains. Haven’t tried it in sand yet but I am sure it will be great with the wide wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the plastic wheels. They are loud as hell on concrete. Draws attention. I put heavy duty gorilla tape around the wheels! So , much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this for transporting my scuba gear. I’m able to carry 2 steel tanks along with my other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Best for the beach
customer_reviews.text: The wagon is the best for the beach!! It is vary spacious and can handle the weight of all your beachside goodies. We hauled 3 boogie boards, 2 chairs, a small ice chest, 4 towels and a bag of beach toys with ease. The side table is a really nice feature for keeping drinks away from the sand. This will come in handy during festivals and Mardi Gras too!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R.

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for the beach. It doesn’t work in the sand. It’s essentially a top heavy three wheeled basked. Tips over easily. If weight isn’t perfectly evenly distributed the front or rear wheels pop up. If I didn’t throw away the original packaging material I would return. Looks nice it simply doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jeffcott

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Good for collecting firewood at campground and compact for storage in motor home.
customer_reviews.author: randyl42

customer_reviews.title: Best wheels for non-smooth surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide wheels! Took this on a trip to the river and it maneuvered more easily than I thought it would on the rocks. Still had some difficulty in some spots which was expected but still easier than the wagon with the narrower wheels.
customer_reviews.author: I. Raycraft

customer_reviews.title: This buggy works fantastically!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this. It truly is the best buggy for the beach. I’ve lived on the beach my entire life and have tried many different options. My sister bought this one and after threatening to steal it from her I bought one for myself. I think having the two front wheels together in the center is what makes it so usable. I have no clue, not an engineer. Just a dude that goes to the beach daily.
customer_reviews.author: jon monette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wagon for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon! We bought it for our beach trip since my husband recently had back surgery and wouldn’t be able to carry our stuff down to the beach. We piled the cooler, canopy, chairs etc in it and had absolutely no problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for the beach. It pulls easily and we have not experienced any tipping
customer_reviews.author: AmStlCrzy

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky , too big of a wheels that’s so hard to maneuver . You have to make sure it doesn’t topple over because the balance is off when you have heavy stuff on it.. I wouldn’t recommend. There are other cheaper products like this that works better . Keep looking ..

product_meta.title: Mac Sports Heavy Duty Collapsible Folding All Terrain Utility Wagon Beach Cart with Table - Black
product_meta.description: Have you ever thought of spending more time outdoors with your kids, friends, and loved ones? As “outdoor people”, we know first-hand the significance of relaxation and convenience. Whether you’re spending time camping, tailgating or at your kid’s soccer game... So, our initial goal was to create products that make it possible for everyone to enjoy - offering convenience to get on location, comfortability on every outdoor occasion, and maximum flexibility when you return back home. Take a picnic to the lake and dismiss any worries of spilled drinks, or cell phones accidentally dropped in the water while you’re netting The Big Catch. And while waiting for the perfect fish to bite, sidle up to the table for a cold drink and snacks with your friends. Who needs a picnic table when they’ve got the Mac Wagon with Side Table? Load up this foldable wagon with all of your beach or backyard essentials and get ready for an easy haul. One year warranty included.
